svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(187, 222, 251), rgb(25, 55, 80)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(21, 101, 192), rgb(99, 168, 246));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
用户输入
创意想法 · 参考图片 · 参考视频

switch.text: 用户输入 创意想法 · 参考图片 · 参考视频

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(200, 230, 201), rgb(28, 54, 29)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(46, 125, 50), rgb(100, 168, 104));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 123px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 1-2：理解创意 & 深度挖掘
自动扫描 5 维度完整度（主题 · 时长 · 风格 · 素材 · 声音）
缺失维度 → AskUserQuestion 动态选项补全（1-3 轮）

switch.text: Phase 1-2：理解创意 & 深度挖掘...

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 224, 178), rgb(66, 39, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(230, 81, 0), rgb(251, 123, 53));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 243px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 0：素材制备 ★ 自适应
检测缺失素材 → AskUserQuestion 确认生成计划
角色三视图（正/侧/背） · 场景概念图 · 关键帧
已有素材自动跳过

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(225, 190, 231), rgb(86, 56, 92)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(106, 27, 154), rgb(237, 169, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 335px; margin-left: 1px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
31s+
独立生成 + 首帧衔接

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 243, 224), rgb(36, 26, 9)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(230, 81, 0), rgb(251, 123, 53));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 465px; margin-left: 176px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(197, 202, 233), rgb(56, 61, 87)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(40, 53, 147), rgb(174, 185, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 538px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 4：即梦提示词
技术参数 → 时间戳分镜 → @引用 → 禁止项
直接复制粘贴到即梦平台

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(215, 204, 200), rgb(68, 58, 55)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(78, 52, 46), rgb(206, 184, 178));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 638px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 5：操作指引
上传素材 → 设置参数 → 生成 → 截帧衔接 → 剪映拼接

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
